properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I looked over Jordan and what did I see? Commin’ for to carry me home There was a band of angels, a-commin after me Commin’ for to carry me home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Swing low, sweet chariot Commin’ for to carry me home Swing low, sweet chariot Commin’ for to carry me home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’m sometimes up, and I’m sometimes down Comin’ for to carry me home But but I know my soul is heavenly bound Comin’ for to carry me home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Swing low, sweet chariot Commin’ for to carry me home Swing low, sweet chariot Commin’ for to carry me home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If you get there before I do Comin’ for to carry me home Tell all my friends that I’m a-comin’ too Comin’ for to carry me home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Swing low, sweet chariot Commin’ for to carry me home Swing low, sweet chariot Commin’ for to carry me home And now they’re commin for to carry me home{/lang-eng}
